sqlMap.select:
/** SQL_ID : BO.Stat.RetrieveCompareRealStat.selectRetrieveCompareRealStatList **/
SELECT '1' GBN , NVL(SUM(DECODE(A.RECEV_SYS_DIV_CD,'05',DECODE(A.RECEV_DIV_CD, '001', A.SUPP_GOODS_CNT-A.RETURN_GD_CNT,0),0)),0) AS SUMSPCLTYSUPPGOODSCNT , NVL(SUM(DECODE(A.RECEV_SYS_DIV_CD,'05',DECODE(A.RECEV_DIV_CD, '001', A.SETL_AMT-A.RETURN_GD_AMT,0),0)),0) AS SUMSPCLTYSUPPAMT , NVL(SUM(DECODE(A.RECEV_SYS_DIV_CD,'05',DECODE(A.RECEV_DIV_CD, '001', A.GOODS_PRCL_PRC,0),0)),0) AS SUMSPCLTYSUPPPRC , NVL(SUM(DECODE(A.RECEV_SYS_DIV_CD,'05',DECODE(A.RECEV_DIV_CD, '002', A.SUPP_GOODS_CNT-A.RETURN_GD_CNT,0),0)),0) AS SUMFLWRDELIVSUPPGOODSCNT , NVL(SUM(DECODE(A.RECEV_SYS_DIV_CD,'05',DECODE(A.RECEV_DIV_CD, '002', A.SETL_AMT-A.RETURN_GD_AMT,0),0)),0) AS SUMFLWRDELIVRECEVAMT , NVL(SUM(DECODE(A.RECEV_SYS_DIV_CD,'05',DECODE(A.RECEV_DIV_CD, '005', A.SUPP_GOODS_CNT-A.RETURN_GD_CNT,0),0)),0) AS SUMPOSTETCSUPPGOODSCNT , NVL(SUM(DECODE(A.RECEV_SYS_DIV_CD,'05',DECODE(A.RECEV_DIV_CD, '005', A.SETL_AMT-A.RETURN_GD_AMT,0),0)),0) AS SUMPOSTETCSUPPAMT , NVL(SUM(DECODE(A.RECEV_SYS_DIV_CD,'05',DECODE(A.RECEV_DIV_CD, '005', A.GOODS_PRCL_PRC,0),0)),0) AS SUMPOSTETCSUPPPRC , NVL(SUM(DECODE(A.RECEV_SYS_DIV_CD,'05',A.SUPP_GOODS_CNT-A.RETURN_GD_CNT,0)),0) AS OFFTOTGOODSCNT , NVL(SUM(DECODE(A.RECEV_SYS_DIV_CD,'05',A.SETL_AMT-A.RETURN_GD_AMT,0)),0) AS OFFTOTSELLAMT , NVL(SUM(DECODE(A.RECEV_SYS_DIV_CD,'05',A.GOODS_PRCL_PRC,0)),0) AS OFFTOTSELLPRC , NVL(SUM(DECODE(A.RECEV_SYS_DIV_CD,'02',0,'04',0,'05',0,DECODE(A.RECEV_DIV_CD, '001', A.SUPP_GOODS_CNT-A.RETURN_GD_CNT, '011', A.SUPP_GOODS_CNT-A.RETURN_GD_CNT, '015', A.SUPP_GOODS_CNT-A.RETURN_GD_CNT,0))),0) AS ONSUMSPCLTYSUPPGOODSCNT , NVL(SUM(DECODE(A.RECEV_SYS_DIV_CD,'02',0,'04',0,'05',0,DECODE(A.RECEV_DIV_CD, '001', A.SETL_AMT-A.RETURN_GD_AMT, '011', A.SETL_AMT-A.RETURN_GD_AMT, '015', A.SETL_AMT-A.RETURN_GD_AMT,0))),0) AS ONSUMSPCLTYSUPPAMT , NVL(SUM(DECODE(A.RECEV_SYS_DIV_CD,'02',0,'04',0,'05',0,DECODE(A.RECEV_DIV_CD, '001', A.GOODS_PRCL_PRC, '011', A.GOODS_PRCL_PRC, '015', A.GOODS_PRCL_PRC,0))),0) AS ONSUMSPCLTYSUPPPRC , NVL(SUM(DECODE(A.RECEV_SYS_DIV_CD,'02',0,'04',0,'05',0,DECODE(A.RECEV_DIV_CD, '002', A.SUPP_GOODS_CNT-A.RETURN_GD_CNT, '012', A.SUPP_GOODS_CNT-A.RETURN_GD_CNT, '016', A.SUPP_GOODS_CNT-A.RETURN_GD_CNT,0))),0) AS ONSUMFLWRDELIVSUPPGOODSCNT , NVL(SUM(DECODE(A.RECEV_SYS_DIV_CD,'02',0,'04',0,'05',0,DECODE(A.RECEV_DIV_CD, '002', A.SETL_AMT-A.RETURN_GD_AMT, '012', A.SETL_AMT-A.RETURN_GD_AMT, '016', A.SETL_AMT-A.RETURN_GD_AMT,0))),0) AS ONSUMFLWRDELIVRECEVAMT , NVL(SUM(DECODE(A.RECEV_SYS_DIV_CD,'02',0,'04',0,'05',0,DECODE(A.RECEV_DIV_CD, '008', A.SUPP_GOODS_CNT-A.RETURN_GD_CNT, '019', A.SUPP_GOODS_CNT-A.RETURN_GD_CNT, '020', A.SUPP_GOODS_CNT-A.RETURN_GD_CNT, '060', A.SUPP_GOODS_CNT-A.RETURN_GD_CNT, '061', A.SUPP_GOODS_CNT-A.RETURN_GD_CNT, '062', A.SUPP_GOODS_CNT-A.RETURN_GD_CNT,0),0)),0) AS ESCSUMSPCLTYSUPPGOODSCNT , NVL(SUM(DECODE(A.RECEV_SYS_DIV_CD,'02',0,'04',0,'05',0,DECODE(A.RECEV_DIV_CD, '008', A.SETL_AMT-A.RETURN_GD_AMT, '019', A.SETL_AMT-A.RETURN_GD_AMT, '020', A.SETL_AMT-A.RETURN_GD_AMT, '060', A.SETL_AMT-A.RETURN_GD_AMT, '061', A.SETL_AMT-A.RETURN_GD_AMT, '062', A.SETL_AMT-A.RETURN_GD_AMT,0),0)),0) AS ESCSUMSPCLTYSUPPAMT , NVL(SUM(DECODE(A.RECEV_SYS_DIV_CD,'02',0,'04',0,'05',0,DECODE(A.RECEV_DIV_CD, '008', A.GOODS_PRCL_PRC, '019', A.GOODS_PRCL_PRC, '020', A.GOODS_PRCL_PRC, '060', A.GOODS_PRCL_PRC, '061', A.GOODS_PRCL_PRC, '062', A.GOODS_PRCL_PRC,0),0)),0) AS ESCSUMSPCLTYSUPPPRC , NVL(SUM(DECODE(A.RECEV_SYS_DIV_CD,'02',0,'04',0,'05',0,DECODE(A.RECEV_DIV_CD, '005', A.SUPP_GOODS_CNT-A.RETURN_GD_CNT, '017', A.SUPP_GOODS_CNT-A.RETURN_GD_CNT, '018', A.SUPP_GOODS_CNT-A.RETURN_GD_CNT,0))),0) AS ETCSUMSPCLTYSUPPGOODSCNT , NVL(SUM(DECODE(A.RECEV_SYS_DIV_CD,'02',0,'04',0,'05',0,DECODE(A.RECEV_DIV_CD, '005', A.SETL_AMT-A.RETURN_GD_AMT, '017', A.SETL_AMT-A.RETURN_GD_AMT, '018', A.SETL_AMT-A.RETURN_GD_AMT,0))),0) AS ETCSUMSPCLTYSUPPAMT , NVL(SUM(DECODE(A.RECEV_SYS_DIV_CD,'02',0,'04',0,'05',0,DECODE(A.RECEV_DIV_CD, '005', A.GOODS_PRCL_PRC, '017', A.GOODS_PRCL_PRC, '018', A.GOODS_PRCL_PRC,0))),0) AS ETCSUMSPCLTYSUPPPRC , NVL(SUM(DECODE(A.RECEV_SYS_DIV_CD,'02',0,'04',0,'05',0,DECODE(A.RECEV_DIV_CD, '014', A.SUPP_GOODS_CNT-A.RETURN_GD_CNT, '031', A.SUPP_GOODS_CNT-A.RETURN_GD_CNT, '032', A.SUPP_GOODS_CNT-A.RETURN_GD_CNT, '004', A.SUPP_GOODS_CNT-A.RETURN_GD_CNT, '021', A.SUPP_GOODS_CNT-A.RETURN_GD_CNT, '022', A.SUPP_GOODS_CNT-A.RETURN_GD_CNT, '050', A.SUPP_GOODS_CNT-A.RETURN_GD_CNT, '051', A.SUPP_GOODS_CNT-A.RETURN_GD_CNT, '052', A.SUPP_GOODS_CNT-A.RETURN_GD_CNT,0),0)),0) AS BTBSUMSPCLTYSUPPGOODSCNT , NVL(SUM(DECODE(A.RECEV_SYS_DIV_CD,'02',0,'04',0,'05',0,DECODE(A.RECEV_DIV_CD, '014', A.SETL_AMT-A.RETURN_GD_AMT, '031', A.SETL_AMT-A.RETURN_GD_AMT, '032', A.SETL_AMT-A.RETURN_GD_AMT, '004', A.SETL_AMT-A.RETURN_GD_AMT, '021', A.SETL_AMT-A.RETURN_GD_AMT, '022', A.SETL_AMT-A.RETURN_GD_AMT, '050', A.SETL_AMT-A.RETURN_GD_AMT, '051', A.SETL_AMT-A.RETURN_GD_AMT, '052', A.SETL_AMT-A.RETURN_GD_AMT,0),0)),0) AS BTBSUMSPCLTYSUPPAMT , NVL(SUM(DECODE(A.RECEV_SYS_DIV_CD,'02',0,'04',0,'05',0,DECODE(A.RECEV_DIV_CD, '014', A.GOODS_PRCL_PRC, '031', A.GOODS_PRCL_PRC, '032', A.GOODS_PRCL_PRC, '004', A.GOODS_PRCL_PRC, '021', A.GOODS_PRCL_PRC, '022', A.GOODS_PRCL_PRC, '050', A.GOODS_PRCL_PRC, '051', A.GOODS_PRCL_PRC, '052', A.GOODS_PRCL_PRC,0),0)),0) AS BTBSUMSPCLTYSUPPPRC , NVL(SUM(DECODE(A.RECEV_SYS_DIV_CD,'02',0,'04',0,'05',0,DECODE(A.RECEV_DIV_CD, '006', A.SUPP_GOODS_CNT-A.RETURN_GD_CNT, '040', A.SUPP_GOODS_CNT-A.RETURN_GD_CNT, '041', A.SUPP_GOODS_CNT-A.RETURN_GD_CNT, '042', A.SUPP_GOODS_CNT-A.RETURN_GD_CNT,0))),0) AS OVERSUMSPCLTYSUPPGOODSCNT , NVL(SUM(DECODE(A.RECEV_SYS_DIV_CD,'02',0,'04',0,'05',0,DECODE(A.RECEV_DIV_CD, '006', A.SETL_AMT-A.RETURN_GD_AMT, '040', A.SETL_AMT-A.RETURN_GD_AMT, '041', A.SETL_AMT-A.RETURN_GD_AMT, '042', A.SETL_AMT-A.RETURN_GD_AMT,0))),0) AS OVERSUMSPCLTYSUPPAMT , NVL(SUM(DECODE(A.RECEV_SYS_DIV_CD,'02',0,'04',0,'05',0,DECODE(A.RECEV_DIV_CD, '006', A.GOODS_PRCL_PRC, '040', A.GOODS_PRCL_PRC, '041', A.GOODS_PRCL_PRC, '042', A.GOODS_PRCL_PRC,0))),0) AS OVERSUMSPCLTYSUPPPRC , NVL(SUM(DECODE(A.RECEV_SYS_DIV_CD,'02',0,'04',0,'05',0,A.SUPP_GOODS_CNT-A.RETURN_GD_CNT)),0) AS ONTOTGOODSCNT , NVL(SUM(DECODE(A.RECEV_SYS_DIV_CD,'02',0,'04',0,'05',0,A.SETL_AMT-A.RETURN_GD_AMT)),0) AS ONTOTSELLAMT , NVL(SUM(DECODE(A.RECEV_SYS_DIV_CD,'02',0,'04',0,'05',0,A.GOODS_PRCL_PRC)),0) AS ONTOTPRC , NVL(SUM(DECODE(A.RECEV_SYS_DIV_CD,'02',0,'04',0,A.SUPP_GOODS_CNT-A.RETURN_GD_CNT)),0) AS TOTGOODSCNT , NVL(SUM(DECODE(A.RECEV_SYS_DIV_CD,'02',0,'04',0,A.SETL_AMT-A.RETURN_GD_AMT)),0) AS TOTSELLAMT , NVL(SUM(DECODE(A.RECEV_SYS_DIV_CD,'02',0,'04',0,A.GOODS_PRCL_PRC)),0) AS TOTSELLPRC FROM (SELECT RCOCD, REGIPOCD FROM PICMT0060 WHERE USEYN='Y') B , MP_POST_SHOP_SUPP_DAY A WHERE A.SUPP_PO_REGI_PO_CD = B.REGIPOCD(+) AND A.RECEV_STUS_CD = 'O02' AND A.SELL_CLOSE_YMD BETWEEN #searchFromDate1# AND #searchToDate1# UNION ALL SELECT '2' GBN , NVL(SUM(DECODE(A.RECEV_SYS_DIV_CD,'05',DECODE(A.RECEV_DIV_CD, '001', A.SUPP_GOODS_CNT-A.RETURN_GD_CNT,0),0)),0) AS SUMSPCLTYSUPPGOODSCNT , NVL(SUM(DECODE(A.RECEV_SYS_DIV_CD,'05',DECODE(A.RECEV_DIV_CD, '001', A.SETL_AMT-A.RETURN_GD_AMT,0),0)),0) AS SUMSPCLTYSUPPAMT , NVL(SUM(DECODE(A.RECEV_SYS_DIV_CD,'05',DECODE(A.RECEV_DIV_CD, '001', A.GOODS_PRCL_PRC,0),0)),0) AS SUMSPCLTYSUPPPRC , NVL(SUM(DECODE(A.RECEV_SYS_DIV_CD,'05',DECODE(A.RECEV_DIV_CD, '002', A.SUPP_GOODS_CNT-A.RETURN_GD_CNT,0),0)),0) AS SUMFLWRDELIVSUPPGOODSCNT , NVL(SUM(DECODE(A.RECEV_SYS_DIV_CD,'05',DECODE(A.RECEV_DIV_CD, '002', A.SETL_AMT-A.RETURN_GD_AMT,0),0)),0) AS SUMFLWRDELIVRECEVAMT , NVL(SUM(DECODE(A.RECEV_SYS_DIV_CD,'05',DECODE(A.RECEV_DIV_CD, '005', A.SUPP_GOODS_CNT-A.RETURN_GD_CNT,0),0)),0) AS SUMPOSTETCSUPPGOODSCNT , NVL(SUM(DECODE(A.RECEV_SYS_DIV_CD,'05',DECODE(A.RECEV_DIV_CD, '005', A.SETL_AMT-A.RETURN_GD_AMT,0),0)),0) AS SUMPOSTETCSUPPAMT , NVL(SUM(DECODE(A.RECEV_SYS_DIV_CD,'05',DECODE(A.RECEV_DIV_CD, '005', A.GOODS_PRCL_PRC,0),0)),0) AS SUMPOSTETCSUPPPRC , NVL(SUM(DECODE(A.RECEV_SYS_DIV_CD,'05',A.SUPP_GOODS_CNT-A.RETURN_GD_CNT,0)),0) AS OFFTOTGOODSCNT , NVL(SUM(DECODE(A.RECEV_SYS_DIV_CD,'05',A.SETL_AMT-A.RETURN_GD_AMT,0)),0) AS OFFTOTSELLAMT , NVL(SUM(DECODE(A.RECEV_SYS_DIV_CD,'05',A.GOODS_PRCL_PRC,0)),0) AS OFFTOTSELLPRC , NVL(SUM(DECODE(A.RECEV_SYS_DIV_CD,'02',0,'04',0,'05',0,DECODE(A.RECEV_DIV_CD, '001', A.SUPP_GOODS_CNT-A.RETURN_GD_CNT, '011', A.SUPP_GOODS_CNT-A.RETURN_GD_CNT, '015', A.SUPP_GOODS_CNT-A.RETURN_GD_CNT,0))),0) AS ONSUMSPCLTYSUPPGOODSCNT , NVL(SUM(DECODE(A.RECEV_SYS_DIV_CD,'02',0,'04',0,'05',0,DECODE(A.RECEV_DIV_CD, '001', A.SETL_AMT-A.RETURN_GD_AMT, '011', A.SETL_AMT-A.RETURN_GD_AMT, '015', A.SETL_AMT-A.RETURN_GD_AMT,0))),0) AS ONSUMSPCLTYSUPPAMT , NVL(SUM(DECODE(A.RECEV_SYS_DIV_CD,'02',0,'04',0,'05',0,DECODE(A.RECEV_DIV_CD, '001', A.GOODS_PRCL_PRC, '011', A.GOODS_PRCL_PRC, '015', A.GOODS_PRCL_PRC,0))),0) AS ONSUMSPCLTYSUPPPRC , NVL(SUM(DECODE(A.RECEV_SYS_DIV_CD,'02',0,'04',0,'05',0,DECODE(A.RECEV_DIV_CD, '002', A.SUPP_GOODS_CNT-A.RETURN_GD_CNT, '012', A.SUPP_GOODS_CNT-A.RETURN_GD_CNT, '016', A.SUPP_GOODS_CNT-A.RETURN_GD_CNT,0))),0) AS ONSUMFLWRDELIVSUPPGOODSCNT , NVL(SUM(DECODE(A.RECEV_SYS_DIV_CD,'02',0,'04',0,'05',0,DECODE(A.RECEV_DIV_CD, '002', A.SETL_AMT-A.RETURN_GD_AMT, '012', A.SETL_AMT-A.RETURN_GD_AMT, '016', A.SETL_AMT-A.RETURN_GD_AMT,0))),0) AS ONSUMFLWRDELIVRECEVAMT , NVL(SUM(DECODE(A.RECEV_SYS_DIV_CD,'02',0,'04',0,'05',0,DECODE(A.RECEV_DIV_CD, '008', A.SUPP_GOODS_CNT-A.RETURN_GD_CNT, '019', A.SUPP_GOODS_CNT-A.RETURN_GD_CNT, '020', A.SUPP_GOODS_CNT-A.RETURN_GD_CNT, '060', A.SUPP_GOODS_CNT-A.RETURN_GD_CNT, '061', A.SUPP_GOODS_CNT-A.RETURN_GD_CNT, '062', A.SUPP_GOODS_CNT-A.RETURN_GD_CNT,0),0)),0) AS ESCSUMSPCLTYSUPPGOODSCNT , NVL(SUM(DECODE(A.RECEV_SYS_DIV_CD,'02',0,'04',0,'05',0,DECODE(A.RECEV_DIV_CD, '008', A.SETL_AMT-A.RETURN_GD_AMT, '019', A.SETL_AMT-A.RETURN_GD_AMT, '020', A.SETL_AMT-A.RETURN_GD_AMT, '060', A.SETL_AMT-A.RETURN_GD_AMT, '061', A.SETL_AMT-A.RETURN_GD_AMT, '062', A.SETL_AMT-A.RETURN_GD_AMT,0),0)),0) AS ESCSUMSPCLTYSUPPAMT , NVL(SUM(DECODE(A.RECEV_SYS_DIV_CD,'02',0,'04',0,'05',0,DECODE(A.RECEV_DIV_CD, '008', A.GOODS_PRCL_PRC, '019', A.GOODS_PRCL_PRC, '020', A.GOODS_PRCL_PRC, '060', A.GOODS_PRCL_PRC, '061', A.GOODS_PRCL_PRC, '062', A.GOODS_PRCL_PRC,0),0)),0) AS ESCSUMSPCLTYSUPPPRC , NVL(SUM(DECODE(A.RECEV_SYS_DIV_CD,'02',0,'04',0,'05',0,DECODE(A.RECEV_DIV_CD, '005', A.SUPP_GOODS_CNT-A.RETURN_GD_CNT, '017', A.SUPP_GOODS_CNT-A.RETURN_GD_CNT, '018', A.SUPP_GOODS_CNT-A.RETURN_GD_CNT,0))),0) AS ETCSUMSPCLTYSUPPGOODSCNT , NVL(SUM(DECODE(A.RECEV_SYS_DIV_CD,'02',0,'04',0,'05',0,DECODE(A.RECEV_DIV_CD, '005', A.SETL_AMT-A.RETURN_GD_AMT, '017', A.SETL_AMT-A.RETURN_GD_AMT, '018', A.SETL_AMT-A.RETURN_GD_AMT,0))),0) AS ETCSUMSPCLTYSUPPAMT , NVL(SUM(DECODE(A.RECEV_SYS_DIV_CD,'02',0,'04',0,'05',0,DECODE(A.RECEV_DIV_CD, '005', A.GOODS_PRCL_PRC, '017', A.GOODS_PRCL_PRC, '018', A.GOODS_PRCL_PRC,0))),0) AS ETCSUMSPCLTYSUPPPRC , NVL(SUM(DECODE(A.RECEV_SYS_DIV_CD,'02',0,'04',0,'05',0,DECODE(A.RECEV_DIV_CD, '014', A.SUPP_GOODS_CNT-A.RETURN_GD_CNT, '031', A.SUPP_GOODS_CNT-A.RETURN_GD_CNT, '032', A.SUPP_GOODS_CNT-A.RETURN_GD_CNT, '004', A.SUPP_GOODS_CNT-A.RETURN_GD_CNT, '021', A.SUPP_GOODS_CNT-A.RETURN_GD_CNT, '022', A.SUPP_GOODS_CNT-A.RETURN_GD_CNT, '050', A.SUPP_GOODS_CNT-A.RETURN_GD_CNT, '051', A.SUPP_GOODS_CNT-A.RETURN_GD_CNT, '052', A.SUPP_GOODS_CNT-A.RETURN_GD_CNT,0),0)),0) AS BTBSUMSPCLTYSUPPGOODSCNT , NVL(SUM(DECODE(A.RECEV_SYS_DIV_CD,'02',0,'04',0,'05',0,DECODE(A.RECEV_DIV_CD, '014', A.SETL_AMT-A.RETURN_GD_AMT, '031', A.SETL_AMT-A.RETURN_GD_AMT, '032', A.SETL_AMT-A.RETURN_GD_AMT, '004', A.SETL_AMT-A.RETURN_GD_AMT, '021', A.SETL_AMT-A.RETURN_GD_AMT, '022', A.SETL_AMT-A.RETURN_GD_AMT, '050', A.SETL_AMT-A.RETURN_GD_AMT, '051', A.SETL_AMT-A.RETURN_GD_AMT, '052', A.SETL_AMT-A.RETURN_GD_AMT,0),0)),0) AS BTBSUMSPCLTYSUPPAMT , NVL(SUM(DECODE(A.RECEV_SYS_DIV_CD,'02',0,'04',0,'05',0,DECODE(A.RECEV_DIV_CD, '014', A.GOODS_PRCL_PRC, '031', A.GOODS_PRCL_PRC, '032', A.GOODS_PRCL_PRC, '004', A.GOODS_PRCL_PRC, '021', A.GOODS_PRCL_PRC, '022', A.GOODS_PRCL_PRC, '050', A.GOODS_PRCL_PRC, '051', A.GOODS_PRCL_PRC, '052', A.GOODS_PRCL_PRC,0),0)),0) AS BTBSUMSPCLTYSUPPPRC , NVL(SUM(DECODE(A.RECEV_SYS_DIV_CD,'02',0,'04',0,'05',0,DECODE(A.RECEV_DIV_CD, '006', A.SUPP_GOODS_CNT-A.RETURN_GD_CNT, '040', A.SUPP_GOODS_CNT-A.RETURN_GD_CNT, '041', A.SUPP_GOODS_CNT-A.RETURN_GD_CNT, '042', A.SUPP_GOODS_CNT-A.RETURN_GD_CNT,0))),0) AS OVERSUMSPCLTYSUPPGOODSCNT , NVL(SUM(DECODE(A.RECEV_SYS_DIV_CD,'02',0,'04',0,'05',0,DECODE(A.RECEV_DIV_CD, '006', A.SETL_AMT-A.RETURN_GD_AMT, '040', A.SETL_AMT-A.RETURN_GD_AMT, '041', A.SETL_AMT-A.RETURN_GD_AMT, '042', A.SETL_AMT-A.RETURN_GD_AMT,0))),0) AS OVERSUMSPCLTYSUPPAMT , NVL(SUM(DECODE(A.RECEV_SYS_DIV_CD,'02',0,'04',0,'05',0,DECODE(A.RECEV_DIV_CD, '006', A.GOODS_PRCL_PRC, '040', A.GOODS_PRCL_PRC, '041', A.GOODS_PRCL_PRC, '042', A.GOODS_PRCL_PRC,0))),0) AS OVERSUMSPCLTYSUPPPRC , NVL(SUM(DECODE(A.RECEV_SYS_DIV_CD,'02',0,'04',0,'05',0,A.SUPP_GOODS_CNT-A.RETURN_GD_CNT)),0) AS ONTOTGOODSCNT , NVL(SUM(DECODE(A.RECEV_SYS_DIV_CD,'02',0,'04',0,'05',0,A.SETL_AMT-A.RETURN_GD_AMT)),0) AS ONTOTSELLAMT , NVL(SUM(DECODE(A.RECEV_SYS_DIV_CD,'02',0,'04',0,'05',0,A.GOODS_PRCL_PRC)),0) AS ONTOTPRC , NVL(SUM(DECODE(A.RECEV_SYS_DIV_CD,'02',0,'04',0,A.SUPP_GOODS_CNT-A.RETURN_GD_CNT)),0) AS TOTGOODSCNT , NVL(SUM(DECODE(A.RECEV_SYS_DIV_CD,'02',0,'04',0,A.SETL_AMT-A.RETURN_GD_AMT)),0) AS TOTSELLAMT , NVL(SUM(DECODE(A.RECEV_SYS_DIV_CD,'02',0,'04',0,A.GOODS_PRCL_PRC)),0) AS TOTSELLPRC FROM (SELECT RCOCD, REGIPOCD FROM PICMT0060 WHERE USEYN='Y') B , MP_POST_SHOP_SUPP_DAY A WHERE A.SUPP_PO_REGI_PO_CD = B.REGIPOCD(+) AND A.RECEV_STUS_CD = 'O02' AND A.SELL_CLOSE_YMD BETWEEN #searchFromDate2# AND #searchToDate2#
